projects.title: Network Device Monitoring Dashboard
projects.description: A full-stack dashboard for monitoring network device uptime, availability, status, and performance metrics. Includes user authentication, RBAC, security logging, and device health visibility.

projects.title: Multi-Branch Enterprise Network
projects.description: Project showcasing full enterprise network design using Cisco Packet Tracer with centralized DHCP, DNS, and Web servers hosted at HQ. Static routing used for connectivity between HQ and branches.
